dialogue.htmlContent: Having enslaved all of the imps, there's nothing left for you to do except continue on your way through the tunnels...

[npc.speech(What are you doing?!)] [npc.name] screeches in alarm, [npc.speech(You can't enslave us! Stop it!)]

Grinning at the remaining imps before you, you wonder whether you should continue with your task of enslaving them, or leave them be...

[npc.speech(Stop it!)] [npc.name] scream, [npc.speech(Don't do it! I don't want to be a slave!)]

Grinning at this last defeated imp, you wonder whether you should enslave [npc.herHim] as well, or leave [npc.herHim] be...

Your last opponent collapses to the ground at your feet, and you find yourself looking down at the gang of defeated imps with a relieved smile on your face. Despite their superior numbers, they proved to be no match for your might, and now that you've proven yourself in battle, you wonder what you should do about these trouble-makers.

Considering how many imps there are infesting these tunnels, you know that the chances of encountering these particular foes again are slim-to-none, so if you wanted to do anything with them, now's the time. If nothing else, perhaps you could appropriate the transformation potion that these imps were planning to use on you?

#IF(game.getNonCompanionCharactersPresent().size()==1)

You aren't interested in doing anything more to this last defeated [npc.race], and, standing to one side, you command, [pc.speech(Go on, get out of here, and don't come back!)]

Groaning as [npc.she] pushes [npc.herself] to [npc.her] feet, the [npc.race] does as you say, and staggers off deeper into the tunnels of Submission. After watching [npc.herHim] leave, you prepare to continue on your way...
